⟩ Sauces & Seasonings ⟩

Fajita seasoning

  • Vegetarian/Vegan
  • 1 tbsp cornstarch
  • 2 tsp chilli powder
  • 1 tsp salt
  • 1 tsp paprika
  • 1 tsp sugar
  • 3/4 tsp crushed chicken bouillon cube
  • 1/2 tsp onion powder
  • 1/4 tsp garlic powder
  • 1/4 tsp cayenne pepper
  • 1/4 tsp cumin

Mix and store in an airtight container

Built with NYUM. Enjoy!
